description: Manuel Skye, always in high demand as a young salt-and-pepper daddy, returns to spend time with his friend and fuck buddy Stas Landon, who has been mentoring his own stepson, Aaron Perez. Manuel catches Aaron sniffing his underwear, which gives Manuel an idea. If Aaron is turned on by Manuel, then Stas is going to share his stepson and give Aaron the ride of his life from two raw uncut dicks!
title: Manuel Skye And Stas Landon Share Aaron Perez’s Ass
